name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Elixir**, **Phoenix**, and **Postgres**, leveraging these technologies to build scalable backend systems. Skilled in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines using tools such as **GitLab**, **GitHub**, **Jenkins**, and container orchestration with **Kubernetes** and **Docker**. 

Adept in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS**, ensuring seamless integration with various frontend frameworks including **Next.js**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**. Extensive expertise in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation, utilizing frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django** for seamless data processing. 

Strong compliance-driven development background with a focus on HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, alongside a solid foundation in MLOps, including model training and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
